entry.name: expanding
entry.label: If true, the spacer tries to take all the available space in the panel.

entry.name: length
entry.label: length in pixels of the spacer. Configuration effective only if expanding is set to false. A negative value means an invalid value that should be completely ignored.

entry.name: wrapPage
entry.label: Whether to wrap page when navigating with the spacer.

entry.name: leftClickAction
entry.label: What to do on left-mouse click on the spacer.
